epic_description: Enable customers to select items from the menu, add to cart, and place orders online with an order confirmation system.

user_stories.title: Browse Menu and View Item Details
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to be able to browse the online menu and view details of each item, so I can make informed decisions about what to order.
acceptance_criteria: Given I am on the online ordering page, When I browse the menu, Then I should see a list of available menu items.
Given I am viewing the menu, When I select a menu item, Then I should see detailed information about the item (e.g., description, price, ingredients, images).
Given I am viewing the menu, When an item is unavailable, Then I should be clearly notified (e.g., 'Sold Out' indicator).

user_stories.title: Add Items to Cart and Manage Cart Contents
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to be able to add items to my cart and manage its contents (e.g., adjust quantities, remove items), so I can accurately build my order.
acceptance_criteria: Given I am viewing a menu item, When I click 'Add to Cart', Then the item should be added to my shopping cart.
Given I have items in my cart, When I view my cart, Then I should see a list of the items I've added, along with their quantities and prices.
Given I am viewing my cart, When I change the quantity of an item, Then the cart should update to reflect the new quantity and total price.
Given I am viewing my cart, When I remove an item, Then the item should be removed from my cart.

user_stories.title: Checkout and Payment
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to be able to proceed to checkout and make a payment, so I can finalize my order.
acceptance_criteria: Given I have items in my cart, When I click 'Checkout', Then I should be taken to the checkout page.
Given I am on the checkout page, When I enter my payment information (e.g., credit card details), Then my payment should be processed securely.
Given I am on the checkout page, When I select a delivery or pickup option, Then the order should be processed with the respective choice.

user_stories.title: Order Confirmation and Tracking
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to receive an order confirmation and track my order status, so I can stay informed about my order's progress.
acceptance_criteria: Given I have successfully placed an order, Then I should receive an order confirmation (e.g., email, on-screen message) with order details.
Given I have placed an order, When I check my order status, Then I should be able to view the current status of my order (e.g., 'Received', 'Preparing', 'Out for Delivery', 'Delivered').

test_cases.preconditions: User is on the online ordering page.
steps: Click on a specific menu item.
test_cases.expected_results: Detailed information about the item (description, price, ingredients, image) is displayed.

test_cases.preconditions: User is on the online ordering page.
test_cases.expected_results: A clear notification (e.g., 'Sold Out') is displayed for the unavailable item.

test_cases.preconditions: User is viewing a menu item.
test_cases.expected_results: The item is added to the shopping cart with a default quantity of 1.

test_cases.preconditions: User has items in their cart.
steps: Change the quantity of an item.
test_cases.expected_results: The cart updates to reflect the new quantity and total price.

test_cases.preconditions: User has items in their cart.
test_cases.expected_results: User is redirected to the checkout page.

test_cases.preconditions: User is on the checkout page.
test_cases.expected_results: The system processes the payment securely, displays appropriate delivery options and order confirmation screen.

test_cases.preconditions: User has successfully placed an order.
test_cases.expected_results: User receives an order confirmation (email or on-screen message) with order details.

steps: Check order status (e.g., through a link in the confirmation email or on the website).
test_cases.expected_results: User can view the current status of the order (e.g., 'Received', 'Preparing', 'Out for Delivery', 'Delivered').
